fix.changed: Fixed part of keyboard not working when using Portuguese (Brazil) language
Fixed part of keyboard not working when using Portuguese (Brazil) language
Showing items when they are placed into quad tabs

features.changed: When stash tab is open and name of item is pressed in notification window it will be copied into stash tab search
Added rational fractions instead of decimal ratios while buying/selling currency

minorChanges.changed: Added changelog into "About" section including releases from 1.1.0

fix.changed: Fixed restoring default location of windows

features.changed: Added Vulkan support, it's possible to turn it on from tray settings icon or from settings menu of MT
Added button to dismiss all stash tabs options from grid aligner

minorChanges.changed: Added support for poemap.live bulk trades
Added access to settings from tray menu

fix.changed: Leaving party button when outgoing message was send was trying to kick other player not yourself
Fixed naming of messages kick feature from release 1.1.0
Fixed issue with nullpointer exception while message was corrupted

features.changed: Added kick/leave feature which can be set up for incoming messages responses

minorChanges.changed: Changed font size of game path to make it more readable
Deleted all paypal and discord links
Changed github repo links from Exslims to this Fork
Disabled not working update service (startup is faster now)
